column4: hi there, question.. Ive got an EeePC 701, with EeeXubuntu now installed on the SDHC.. I heard Intrepid Ibex will support the EeePC out of the box, but will I now be able to put it in sleep mode and wake it up even tho its installed running from the SDHC?
thats the only thing I find annoying.. CanÂ´t just close the lid and wake it up later, since it is running from the SDHC
Anyone knows if Intrepid Ibex will support that?
#ubuntu+1 would be the place to go for that
